column4: i'm running ubuntu 12.04 and i want 12.10. is there a way to do a clean install without a cd rom or usb stick? i have the iso downloaded on the computer
i followed the instructions to boot from an iso but grub is not prompting me to select where to boot when the computer starts. it just has the computer splash screen
I have never booted with a ISO from grub so I can't really help there, but if you make a thread on the UF right now with booting ISO from grub problem I suspect you will get a quick answer.
